headline: Terrible Management
pros: I enjoyed the employees at this company, they were smart, polished and experts in their field.
cons: management was  inappropriate and unkind. They were always tanking and took it out on employees

headline: Financial Analyst
pros: This small upstart Wall Street firm offered a great deal of freedom and flexibility.  The overall atmosphere was quite cordial with employees that I dealt with quite aligned with my goals as an employee.
cons: The firm struggled against much larger competitors in the market place and had a quite weak overall investment banking group, which negatively impacted total compensation relative to opportunities at other firms.

headline: good company
pros: good culture, nic people, good management
